name: B.O.T.S Tots
description:
The M.O.T.H.E.R B.O.T has crashed! The worker bots must rebuild the fallen ship to get home. You can help them with this task but be careful, for this planet they crashed on is acid filled and is extremely dangerous to all bots! Unfortunately, the worker bots can't function properly and will need your help to guide them to the resources they need when they need them and to keep them out of danger...

Programming - Livingstone Games

Art - Deadrock

Music - 'Colossal Game Music Collection' by The Indie Devs Nation on Unity Asset Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/colossal-game-music...)
